name: Transfercar Global, Inc.
description: Operator of rental cars and campervans intended to reduce costs in freight services. The company matches those in need of a free rental car with rental car companies that need to reposition their fleet and delivers financial benefits to both rental car companies and flexible travelers, enabling customers to book cars at competitive fares.
one_liner: Operator of rental cars and campervans intended to reduce costs in freight services. The company matches those in need of a free rental car with rental car companies that need to reposition their fleet and delivers financial benefits to both rental car companies and flexible travelers, enabling customers to book cars at competitive fares.
